name: Lotus Flower Crisp
title: Lotus Flower Crisp
desc: Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer... A pleasing sight indeed.

skills.desc:
During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
